revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Cassiopeia}} '''Cassiopeia''' ({{IPAc-en|ˌ|k|æ|s|i|ə|ˈ|p|iː|ə}}) or Cassiopea may refer to:
{{tocright}} ==Mythology== * Cassiopeia ([[Ancient Greek]]: Κασσιόπεια), also Cassiepeia (Κασσιέπεια), is the name of three different figures in Greek mythology: ** [[Cassiopeia (Queen of Aethiopia)]], queen of Aethiopia and mother of Andromeda by Cepheus ** [[Cassiopeia (wife of Phoenix)]], wife of Phoenix, king of Phoenicia ** Cassiopeia, wife of [[Epaphus]], king of Egypt, the son of Zeus and Io; mother of Libya
==Science== * [[Cassiopeia (constellation)]], a northern constellation representing the queen of Ethiopia ** [[Cassiopeia A]], a supernova remnant in that constellation * ''[[Cassiopea]]'', the genus of the "upside-down" jellyfish
==Entertainment== * [[Cassiopeia (film)|''Cassiopeia'' (film)]], a 1996 Brazilian CGI film * [[Cassiopeia (Battlestar Galactica)|Cassiopeia]], a TV character from ''[[Battlestar Galactica]]'' * [[Cassiopea (Encantadia)]], the first Queen of Lireo in the ''Encantadia'' fantasy series of GMA Network * Cassiopeia, a tortoise featured in Michael Ende's fantasy book ''[[Momo (novel)|Momo]]'' * Cassiopeia, the mother of Octavian in ''[[The Astonishing Life of Octavian Nothing]]''
===Music=== * [[Cassiopeia (TVXQ)]], the fan club of South Korean boy band TVXQ * "Cassiopeia" (1971) for percussion solo and orchestra, by [[Toru Takemitsu]]. * [[Casiopea]], (est. 1976) a Japanese jazz fusion group * "Cassiopeia," a song by [[Shabütie]] (now known as [[Coheed and Cambria]]) from their 1999 EP ''The Penelope EP'' * "Cassiopeia," a song by Joanna Newsom from her 2004 album ''[[The Milk-Eyed Mender]]'' * "Cassiopeia," a song by Dragonland from their 2006 album ''[[Astronomy (Dragonland album)|Astronomy]]'' * "Cassiopeia," a song by [[Sunny Lax]] from his 2006 EP ''P.U.M.A./Cassopeia'' * "Cassiopeia," a song by Rain from his 2006 album ''[[Rain's World]]'' * "Cassiopeia," a song by Sara Bareilles from her 2013 album ''[[The Blessed Unrest]]''
==Other== * [[Casio Cassiopeia]], a series of pocket PCs * [[Cassiopeia (train)|''Cassiopeia'' (train)]], an overnight rail service in Japan * [[USS Cassiopeia (AK-75)]], a Crater Class cargo ship used by the United States Navy in World War II
==Fictional Characters== *Cassiopeia "Cassie" Sullivan, a character in the ''5th Wave Trilogy'', written by Rick Yancey.
==See also== * [[Boast of Cassiopeia]] * [[Kassiopi]], a village, and a resort on the affluent north east coast of Corfu
{{disambiguation}}
